scripts.build:frontend: bunx vue-tsc -b && bunx vite build --config vite.config.ts && bun frontend/scripts/clean-dist.cjs
scripts.build:backend: echo 'backend is a Worker; build via wrangler if needed'
scripts.build:all: bunx vue-tsc -b && bunx vite build --config vite.config.ts && bun frontend/scripts/clean-dist.cjs && bun --cwd backend run build
scripts.clean: bun --cwd frontend run clean-dist && rm -rf node_modules/.cache 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.clean:deps: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules bun.lockb frontend/bun.lock backend/bun.lock 2>/dev/null || true && echo '🧹 清理完成，可以重新运行 bun install'
scripts.install:backend-standalone: cd backend && bun install --no-save && echo '📦 backend 已安装独立 node_modules'
